description: Try our easy to follow Homemade Hot Cross Buns recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Homemade Hot Cross Buns Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, to make the glaze, mix golden syrup with 1/4 cup boiling water. Brush over cooked buns while they are still hot. Serve while warm.
